00018 namespace BulletHell.Game.Library
00019 {
00020     public class Waypoint
00021     {
00022         public Vector2 Point { get; private set; }
00023 
00024         public Waypoint(Vector2 point)
00025         {
00026             Point = point;
00027         }
00028 
00029         public Waypoint(float x, float y)
00030         {
00031             Point = new Vector2(x, y);
00032         }
00033 
00034         public bool withinRange(Vector2 pos, float range)
00035         {
00036             return Vector2.Distance(pos, Point) <= range;
00037         }
00038 
00039         /* Create a mirror of this waypoint around the mirrorPosition, 
00040          * such that the created waypoint has the effect of reflection from the mirroir in mirror position */
00041         public Waypoint createMirror(bool xReverse, bool yReverse, Vector2 mirrorPosition)
00042         {
00043             return new Waypoint((xReverse) ? mirrorPosition.X + (mirrorPosition.X - Point.X) : Point.X,
00044                 (yReverse) ? mirrorPosition.Y + (mirrorPosition.Y - Point.Y) : Point.Y);
00045         }
00046     }
00047 }
